thoughts.text: I think I'll use the get_text_summary command to get a summary of the Forbes article. This will help me quickly identify the most interesting places to visit and decide which ones to explore.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting a summary of the Forbes article will help me quickly identify the most interesting places to visit and decide which ones to explore, without having to read the entire article.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the get_text_summary command to get a summary of the Forbes article
- Read the summary to quickly identify the most interesting places to visit
- Decide which places to explore
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that the summary is accurate and that I don't miss any important information by relying solely on the summary.
thoughts.speak: I think I'll use the get_text_summary command to get a summary of the Forbes article.
